name: Fox Adventure (ExVainz)
description:
Fox Adventure is a simple 2D Platformer game where you become a fox and have an adventure to collect cherries for your son.

Controls :

  • "A" Key for move left and "D" key for move right
  • "W" Key for climb up ladder and "S" Key for climb down ladder
  • "Space" Key for jump (You can double jump)

Assets : 

  • Sunny Land | 2D Characters | Unity Asset Store
  • Flashing arrow animation | OpenGameArt.org
  • heart pixel art | OpenGameArt.org

SFX : 

  • FREE Casual Game SFX Pack | Audio Sound FX | Unity Asset Store
  • Footsteps - Essentials | Foley Sound FX | Unity Asset Store
